meanings.definition: A protein found in egg yolk.
meanings.sent1: The chef added vitellin to the cake batter for extra richness.
meanings.sent2: Egg yolks are a good source of vitellin, which is a type of protein.
meanings.sent3: The vitellin in the omelette decided to throw a party for the other ingredients.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as the color of vitellin in the egg yolk.
meanings.sent5: The vitellin shimmered like a golden treasure in the bowl.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to or derived from egg yolk.
meanings.sent1: The recipe called for a vitellin-based sauce to enhance the flavor.
meanings.sent2: The vitellin color of the custard indicated its richness.
meanings.sent3: The vitellin-themed party decorations were a hit among the guests.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was a beautiful shade of vitellin yellow, matching the sunny day.
meanings.sent5: The painting captured the essence of a vitellin sunrise over the farm.
